name: TinyCol

:lg.description: The number of rasters occupied by the column at a responsive width of < 1920px
:lg.description_zh: 在响应式宽度  < 1920px  时，该列占用的栅格数

:md.description: The number of rasters occupied by the column at a responsive width of < 1200px
:md.description_zh: 在响应式宽度  < 1200px  时，该列占用的栅格数

:move.description: The right offset of the child is achieved by the left property, and it is recommended to use offset instead
:move.description_zh: 子项的右偏移量,是通过 left 属性实现偏移,建议使用 offset 代替

:offset.description: The rightward offset of the child is achieved through the margin-left property
:offset.description_zh: 子项的向右偏移量,是通过 margin-left 属性实现偏移

:sm.description: The number of rasters occupied by the column at a responsive width of < 992px
:sm.description_zh: 在响应式宽度  < 992px  时，该列占用的栅格数

:span.description: The number of columns occupied by the child

tag.description: Defines the rendered label of the COL element, which defaults to div
tag.description_zh: 定义 Col 元素的渲染后的标签，默认为div

:xl.description: The number of rasters occupied by the column at a responsive width of >= 1920px
:xl.description_zh: 在响应式宽度  >= 1920px  时，该列占用的栅格数

:xs.description: The number of rasters occupied by the column at a responsive width of < 768px
:xs.description_zh: 在响应式宽度  < 768px  时，该列占用的栅格数

description: 支持 12/24 栅格布局，可使页面布局变得非常简单与清晰。
description_zh: 支持 12/24 栅格布局，可使页面布局变得非常简单与清晰。
